summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2748 for the improvement of Lots 1 and 2, Block 1, in Portland and Puget Sound Railway Addition, and certain other lots and parts of lots in said addition, and in River Park and River Park First Addition to The City of Seattle, all in City of Seattle, by filling the same as a sanitary measure, together with the bulkheading thereof, or the filling of the streets abutting upon said private property with earth to serve as bulkheading for the fill upon such private property, under Ordinance No. 32791, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
